name: RolandLexSupport
_source: speak;Roland;Hey, Lex. Got a question for you.
speak;Roland;I was just wondering how you got this good with a bow.
speak;Roland;Yeah! You shoot that thing like it's nothing. I've tried using bows before, but I've never been the greatest shot.
speak;Lex;I see. Well, I suppose it's all just practice. I've been hunting pretty much since I could hold a bow.
speak;Roland;Hunting, eh? What's your biggest catch?
speak;Lex;My biggest catch{tgm}...{tgm} Well, I've bagged bears and moose before. But there was one time I took down a wild wyvern.
speak;Roland;A wild one? Those things are crazy!
speak;Lex;Very. One attacked my village once. My father was ill, so I was the best shot we had. One arrow, square in the head{tgm}...{tgm} and that was it.
speak;Roland;ONE ARROW? Alright, that settles it. Once we get back to camp, we're going hunting for dinner tonight. Whoever gets the biggest haul wins!
speak;Lex;That sounds fun. I suppose it couldn't hurt.
